Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Deploy AllInStock CRM with Firebase and Eupago payment integration

Major updates:
- Migrated to new Firebase project (allinstock-ded6e)
- Deployed production app to https://allinstock.pt
- Configured custom domain with SSL
- Implemented Eupago payment integration (MB WAY + Multibanco)
- Deployed Cloud Functions for payment processing
- Added landing page with pricing plans
- Implemented admin dashboard for plan management
- Added email hub with Gmail integration
- Added calendar integration
- Enhanced responsive design for mobile devices
- Added purchase orders, invoices, and stock locations features
- Updated Firebase to v5 API with Node 20 runtime

)")
Bash(cmd /c "if exist C:\Users\Utilizador\AppData\Local\Android\Sdk (echo Old SDK folder exists) else (echo Old SDK folder not found)")
Bash(cmd /c "if exist C:\Users\Utilizador\AppData\Local\Android\Sdk (rmdir /s /q C:\Users\Utilizador\AppData\Local\Android\Sdk && echo Deleted old SDK folder) else (echo Old SDK folder not found)")
Bash(cmd /c "cd /d D:\allinstock && move generate-icons.js generate-icons.cjs && node generate-icons.cjs")
